{{- /* The _hedge_redirects.txt file template.

Outputs a redirects file that Hedgerules reads.
Each line: /source /destination

Sources:
1. Hugo aliases from page frontmatter (generated automatically)
2. Custom redirects defined in params.redirects (if any)

Hugo aliases are the primary source of redirects.
Directory index redirects (/path -> /path/) are NOT included here;
Hedgerules generates those by scanning the build output.

*/ -}}
# Redirects generated by Hugo
# Format: /source /destination
{{- range .Site.AllPages -}}
  {{- $dest := .RelPermalink -}}
  {{- range .Aliases }}
{{ . }} {{ $dest }}
  {{- end -}}
{{- end }}
# Custom redirects
{{ range $source, $dest := .Site.Params.redirects -}}
{{ $source }} {{ $dest }}
{{ end -}}
